title: Why are these Evangelicals Scared and the Atheists Falsely Eager about Progressive Evangelicals?
description:
A commentary video by a Youtube channel Pinecreek on a video by Capturing Christianity with Alisa Childers. I had never heard of her but apparently she's got a following doing apologetics and this new career transition from singer came as a response to the rise of what has been called Progressive Evangelicalism. 

The trickle of evangelical celebrity deconstructions is either viewed as a concern or a sign of continued changes in the community of the Christian church. Rachel Held Evans was in many ways a leading voice in that movement and the roots of that migration has been a subject of commentary on this channel. I sum up some of the history of that transition updating it with some of the elements I've been discussing recently. 

Capturing Christianity https://youtu.be/oQ6doQsSQLU
Pinecreek https://youtu.be/QcdsGIu1zU4
Jonathan Steingaard https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/27/entertainment/jonathan-steingard-atheist/index.html
Church history in plain language https://amzn.to/2XlQ8p2
A Severe Mercy https://amzn.to/2Xm7Skl
A History of Christianity in the Reformation Era https://www.audible.com/pd/The-History-of-Christianity-in-the-Reformation-Era-Audiobook/B00DCAPE1K
Transubstantiation https://amzn.to/2TRhEsD
Fatal Discord https://amzn.to/36Mhg3T
Christianity's Dangerous Idea https://amzn.to/3dnqbLv
Mark Noll History of Christianity in USA and Canada https://amzn.to/3djPrSQ
1493 https://amzn.to/36KPtkn
Guns Germs and Steel https://amzn.to/3eGrCor
A Secular Age https://amzn.to/2yTGBfK
The Discarded Image https://amzn.to/3eyQnTJ
Pastor in a Secular Age https://amzn.to/3dmqztF
The Everlasting Man https://amzn.to/3eBp3UJ
Nassim Taleb Skin in the Game Talks at Google https://youtu.be/uv6KLbkvua8
Mouthy Buddha Sam Harris losing audience to Jordan Peterson https://youtu.be/iBSOTY1rTtg
Great and Holy War by Philip Jenkins https://amzn.to/3cqrGYa
